title: Brittney Griner Faces a Long Journey Through the Russian Legal System
sub_head: The WNBA star has been detained for weeks. What happens next in her case?
body:
An American schoolteacher was stopped at Moscowâ€™s airport in the summer of 2021 with marijuana and hashish oil in his bags, arrested on drug trafficking charges and remains in prison while under investigation.
A young Israeli-American tourist was detained in 2019 for carrying a small amount of marijuana in her checked luggage and released nine months later on a pardon from Russian President Vladimir Putin after high-level diplomatic negotiations.
